title: GIGIZAZA Gold Velvet Decorative Throw Pillow Covers,18x18 Pillow Covers for Couch Sofa Bed 2 Pack Soft Cushion Covers
descriptions:
**Product Listing:**

Introducing the GIGIZAZA Gold Velvet Decorative Throw Pillow Covers! Add a touch of luxury and elegance to your living space with these soft and comfortable pillow covers. 

**Product Details:**

- Material: Made from 100% velvet, these pillow covers are incredibly soft and comfortable to the touch.
- Quantity: Each pack includes 2 pillow covers, allowing you to effortlessly update the look of your couch, sofa, or bed.
- Color: The pillow covers come in a stunning gold color, adding a touch of glamour to any room.
- Size: Each cover measures 18 x 18 inches or 45 x 45 cm, making them the perfect size for most standard pillows.
- Suitable Insert Size: These covers are tailored to fit 18 x 18 inch or 20 x 20 inch inserts, ensuring a snug and seamless fit.
- Closure Type: Featuring an invisible zipper closure, these pillow covers provide a sleek and seamless look.
- Zipper Length: The zipper length is longer than 35cm, ensuring easy insertion and removal of the pillow insert.
- Usage: Perfect for various settings, these pillow covers can be used in the living room, bed, chair, window seat, coffee shop, office, or even in your car.
- Washing Instructions: These pillow covers are machine washable. Simply wash them in cold water and tumble dry on low heat for easy maintenance.
- Customer Support: We value your feedback! Contact us for any suggestions or improvements you may have.

Elevate the look of your home decor with the GIGIZAZA Gold Velvet Decorative Throw Pillow Covers. Order your pack of 2 pillow covers today and experience the perfect blend of style and comfort!

**Product Listing:**

Introducing the GIGIZAZA Gold Velvet Decorative Throw Pillow Covers, perfect for adding a touch of luxury and sophistication to your home decor. This set includes 2 pillow covers, tailored to fit 18 x 18 inch or 20 x 20 inch inserts. 

Made from 100% velvet, these pillow covers offer a soft and comfortable texture, ensuring a cozy and inviting feel. The elegant gold color adds a glamorous touch to any space. 

The invisible zipper closure provides a seamless look and easy insertion and removal of the inserts. With a zipper length longer than 35cm, these pillow covers are designed for convenience.

These versatile pillow covers can be used in various settings, including the living room, bed, chair, window seat, coffee shop, office, or even in your car. They are the perfect addition to enhance the ambiance of any space.

Washing these pillow covers is a breeze, as they are machine washable. Simply use cold water and a low drying temperature to maintain their quality and softness.
